prompt: A black-and-white pencil sketch of a dense, misty forest with tall, twisted trees. A narrow dirt path winds into the darkness, leading to a hidden cave entrance partially covered by tangled roots. Shadows stretch unnaturally, creating an eerie atmosphere.

A black-and-white pencil sketch of Winden’s small, quiet town. A row of modest houses lines a wet street, with old-fashioned street lamps casting faint light. In the distance, a cooling tower from the nuclear power plant looms over the town, creating a sense of unease.

A black-and-white pencil sketch of a group of teenagers walking through the forest at night. Flashlights cast narrow beams of light, barely illuminating the thick fog around them. Their expressions are tense, and the shadows of the towering trees create an ominous atmosphere.

A black-and-white pencil sketch of the cave entrance hidden within the forest. The jagged rocks form a dark, gaping hole, and strange markings are faintly visible on the walls. Roots dangle from the top, and an unsettling darkness lingers beyond the entrance.

A black-and-white pencil sketch of the 1986 nuclear power plant. The massive, symmetrical cooling towers dominate the landscape, with faint power lines stretching across the sky. In the foreground, an old, rusted fence and a ‘Restricted Area’ sign add to the foreboding atmosphere.

A black-and-white pencil sketch of Jonas standing in front of a mirror in his dimly lit bedroom. His reflection appears slightly distorted, as if time itself is unstable. The room is messy, with scattered papers and an old photograph resting on the table.

A black-and-white pencil sketch of the Winden high school. The sketch captures the cold, institutional design of the building with large windows and an empty courtyard. A few students linger in the background, their figures blurred, as if frozen in time.

A black-and-white pencil sketch of the mysterious bunker in the woods. Inside, a single chair sits in the center of a dimly lit room, surrounded by outdated scientific equipment. The walls are covered in newspaper clippings and old photographs connected by red string.

A black-and-white pencil sketch of an old, flickering clock in a dusty antique shop. The hands of the clock seem frozen, and scattered gears and pocket watches are displayed around it. The dimly lit shelves behind the counter are filled with strange, forgotten objects.

A black-and-white pencil sketch of the 1953 timeline in Winden. A small town square is surrounded by vintage cars and classic storefronts with old-fashioned signage. The people in the background wear period-accurate clothing, appearing as ghosts of a different era.

A black-and-white pencil sketch of the secret passage inside the cave. The narrow, stone-lined tunnel disappears into darkness, with old electrical wiring running along the walls. A rusted metal door with an ominous ‘Sic Mundus Creatus Est’ inscription stands at the tunnel’s end.

A black-and-white pencil sketch of Ulrich searching frantically in the rain. His soaked jacket clings to him as he holds up an old missing-person poster. The wet streets reflect the dim glow of distant streetlights, while raindrops streak across the scene.

A black-and-white pencil sketch of the time travel device on a workbench. The complex mechanical box is open, revealing intricate gears and glowing tubes. Various blueprints and handwritten notes are scattered around, hinting at the science behind time travel.

A black-and-white pencil sketch of Noah standing under a dim streetlamp. His long coat and composed expression contrast with the eerie glow of the light. The background fades into darkness, making him appear as a shadowy figure watching over Winden.

A black-and-white pencil sketch of Jonas in the post-apocalyptic future. He stands in front of the ruins of Winden, his clothes tattered and face marked by hardship. The collapsed buildings and abandoned streets in the background show a world lost in time.
